channel.title: Unmute Someone!
channel.description:
How can I unmute someone if I muted them by using the report abuse button way? Thank You and have a nice day!
- Eric E.

item.title: Unmute Someone!
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

it unmutes, but when you log out log in your are muted back?

Read full topic

item.title: Unmute Someone!
item.dc:creator: @Eric_E Eric E.
item.description:
@Eric_E wrote:

Thanks, it worked perfectly!

  • Eric E.

Read full topic

item.title: Unmute Someone!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Mmk. Try this,

if (command.startsWith("unmute") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(7); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.muted = 0; p.sendMessage("You have just been un-muted by "+playerName+"!"); sendMessage("Successfully un-muted "+command.substring(7)+""); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Please enter a name that you wish to un-mute"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Unmute Someone!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

[quote=“Eric E., post:3, topic:232279”]Oh, god. It’s you again. I don’t have a mute command. I use the report abuse button.

  • Eric E.[/quote]
    Yes well even though if someone does’nt like me or vice versa I try to start clean and help them.

Try this,

if (command.startsWith("unmute")) { try { String muted = command.substring(7); int playerMuted = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(muted); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerMuted]; m.silent = 0; m.tempmute = 0; m.sendMessage("A member of staff has lifted your mute, allowing you to talk again"); sendMessage(muted+" is no longer permanently muted"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to unmute"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Unmute Someone!
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

go to “More info” folder and click on their name…
comes up with stuff like this;

[code][MOREINFO]
character-clueid = 0
character-cluelevel = 0

character-lastlogin = localhost

[QUESTS]
